summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CareerLift AI Career Transition Platform - Iteration 4. All 4 main pages (Dashboard, CV Generator, Learning Path, Profile) load correctly. Backend APIs working correctly including /api/user/profile, /api/analytics/dashboard, /api/courses (28 real courses with URLs). CV generation with Natural + ATS versions working. PDF/DOCX downloads working. Learning Path generation with 16-week roadmap and clickable course links working. Navigation between all tabs working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/health - Returns healthy status with claude_configured=true
POST /api/auth/login - Authenticates Pro user (test2@test.com) correctly
POST /api/auth/login - Returns 401 for invalid credentials
GET /api/roles - Returns 20 AI roles correctly
GET /api/roles?location=india - Returns roles with local_salary
GET /api/courses - Returns 28 real courses with URLs (Coursera, Fast.ai, etc.)
GET /api/user/profile - Returns complete user data with credits
GET /api/analytics/dashboard - Returns usage analytics
GET /api/usage - Returns all fields including cv_credits and learning_path_credits
GET /api/cv/history - Returns cv_generations array
GET /api/learning-path/history - Returns learning_paths array
GET /api/payments/subscription - Returns subscription info
GET /api/payments/pricing - Returns pricing info
POST /api/cv/generate - Generates Natural + ATS CVs with Claude API
POST /api/cv/download-direct (PDF) - Downloads CV as PDF with professional filename
POST /api/cv/download-direct (DOCX) - Downloads CV as DOCX with professional filename
POST /api/learning-path/generate - Generates 16-week roadmap with real courses
Dashboard loads with usage stats for all 3 features (Analyses, CV Generations, Learning Paths)
CV Generator page loads with resume input, role selector, usage counter
Learning Path page loads with location selector, role selector, expandable weeks
Profile page shows user info, subscription status (Pro), usage stats
Navigation between all 4 tabs works correctly
Pro user has unlimited access (0/âˆž) to all features
critical_code_review_comments: CV generation with Claude API returns Natural + ATS versions with 94+ ATS score
Learning Path generation returns 16-week roadmap with real course URLs
PDF/DOCX downloads working for both CV and Learning Path
Learning Path PDF/DOCX restriction for free users implemented in frontend (not backend)
Course database has 28 real courses with verified URLs from Coursera, Fast.ai, Hugging Face, etc.

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All pages loading, navigation working, forms functional)

seed_data_creation: Created free test user (freeuser_test@test.com) for testing free tier restrictions
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. CV Generator generates Natural + ATS CVs with Claude API. Learning Path generates 16-week roadmap with real course URLs. PDF/DOCX downloads working. Pro user (test2@test.com) has unlimited access. Free user restriction for Learning Path PDF/DOCX is implemented in frontend only.

dashboard.details: Shows usage stats for all 3 features, feature cards, welcome message
